title: LF: Silver - Gold Support Duo Partner
body: Looking for a support main to duo with in the afternoons, usually one game a day. I am currently silver 3, mainly play adc. No skype / Curse voice. Can use curse / skype on Thursday, when I can probs play the most. Main qualities looking for are keeping a eye on the map and focusing on peeling for me.

replies.body: Duoed with this guy before, likes to get B.F. Sword early, generally jinx / graves / kalista main, good picks for support include leona, morgana and thresh. Prefers lane pushed out, rather bad warder (hence being silver and not gold), uses somewhat non-meta builds (such as full-ad non runaan's kalista) that generally work well nonetheless. Never gives up in game, is never toxic, very worthy of duo (I don't have time to duo, otherwise I would).

>rather bad warder

......................

His an ADC main?
yeah, he mains ADC, also can play mid, jg and support, though as I said, not a very good warder :)

1. This is 4 months later.
2. Being a bad warder isn't necessarily a bad thing for ADC's, what you do with the wards your team places means more.

Last Season Support main, experience in high elo. Thresh Morgana mains, with a good backup Leona + Janna.

I'm interested.
